To reproduce open a class file that has associated source.

Test case:
1) set build path to use IBM JDK
2) set runtime JRE to use Sun JDK

Debug into some JDK source - System.out.println("GEY"). 

The editor input in this case is a ZipEntryStorageEditorInput.

Added check for a null compilation unit.
Changed to only update on ITextSelection changes.
Means you can't add breakpoints in this case.
